label: TransportMeans
comment: Reference to a device or method used to convey people, goods, or other objects from place to place.

objectProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this referenced means of transport is accompanied by a driver.
An identifier of this referenced transport means, such as the International Maritime Organization number for a vessel.
The name, expressed as text, of this referenced transport means, such as the vessel name.
The type, expressed as text, of this referenced transport means.
The code specifying the type of referenced transport means [Reference UNECE Recommendation 28].

referencedBy.comment: Details of transport means inactively carried during the transport movement, such as trucks on a Roll-On/Roll-Off (RORO) ferry.
